---
name: Bug report
about: Use this template to describe bugs, errors, or unexpected behavior
title: "\U0001F41B Bug Report: [Short Title]"
labels: bug
assignees: Michela-M
---

### Description

Describe the bug clearly and concisely. What’s going wrong?

### URL / Page

Where does the bug occur? (e.g., `/login`, `/dashboard`, homepage)

### Steps to Reproduce

List the exact steps to trigger the bug:

1. Go to [page]
2. Click on [element]
3. Observe [unexpected behavior]

### Expected Behavior

What should happen instead?

### Actual Behavior

What actually happens?

### Environment

Provide details about where the bug occurs:

- Device: Desktop / Mobile / Tablet
- OS: macOS / Windows / iOS / Android
- Browser: Chrome / Firefox / Safari / Edge
- Screen size or resolution (if relevant)
- App version / commit hash

### Visual Evidence

Include screenshots, screen recordings, or console errors if available.

### Impact

How severe is the bug?

- Cosmetic (UI glitch)
- Functional (feature broken)
- Blocking (can’t proceed)

### Notes

Any ideas on what might be causing it? Is it reproducible every time?
